name: Heatdeath
description:
Welcome to the heatdeath of the universe!

Heatdeath is an online-multiplayer top-down-shooter battle-royale bullet-hell game! 

That being said, heatdeath is a battle-royale on a smaller scale. With fewer players per round, the rounds are more quick and intimate! This makes for a rapid paced and fun experience.

Heatdeath is currently in open beta, so please feel free to discuss any ideas, concerns, or bugs in the comments!

Story: 

Far in the future, long after humans have gone extinct, their A.I. creations still strive for survival. Nearing the heatdeath of the universe they fight inside a super network for the last remaining energy.

Controls: 

Keyboard Controls

  • WASD:Move
  • Mouse:Aim
  • Left Click:Fire
  • Tab:Map
  • ScrollWheel:Zoom Map

PS4 Controller

  • Left Joystick:Move
  • Right Joystick:Aim
  • R2:Fire
  • Touch Pad Button:Map
  • D-Pad Up/Down:Zoom Map
Notes:
  • Windows users, you must allow the game through your firewall. (Mac users require no extra network config).
  • Mac users will need to "RightClick->Open" the application to let the OS know it's safe to play.
  • When you join a game, you will wait in the lobby for other players. If no other players join, you will win the game by default. This is not a glitch but just the way things are for now...
